title: Whats the "1vs5 carry" or "hypercarry" champ that will almost always carry after he wins a lane?
body:
Im stuck at silver when I was D2. climbing is possible but it takes MUCH MORE TIME than it should. i assume its because im not playing hypercarry champions or because im not duoing with somoene with similar skills.


I saw really good Yasuos, Master YIs, and Lux that were able to win game 1vs5. im considering yasuo but honestly none of these fits me.

I personally love gangplank (my new main maybe? hes quite strong, but cant carry game 1v5) and jayce (very easy to get fed but also easy to feed enemy, and i wont say how many times i had stats like 10/1 or 15/2 but couldnt do anything to win game)

So certainly while jayce has "get fed quick" potential and gp is great "teamfight" champ they have zero potential to win game 1vs5.

I won a lot of games 1vs5 in the past in s1-s5 as tryndamere for example but now i play him really bad.



PS I know its team game but i just need a champ that will make me climb quicker to save a lot of time and nerves. what would be good choice?



PS this wasnt supposed to go into player behavior. sorry?

replies.body:
>PS this wasnt supposed to go into player behavior. sorry?

There's not really a quick way to fix that. I'd suggest copy/pasting this to [Gameplay](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance), where you might get some better responses. I'll be locking it so that you get responses to your questions in the proper place (gameplay).

You get back at getting good at the game instead of abusing mechanics.
Tbh i have never won against, or lost with Xerath who won his lane hard.

There is no such champion (that is not instantly nerfed into the floor).

The people doing that are smurfs and also very skilled with their champion. Anyone who is just vastly better than their opponents can do this with nearly any champion.
not really.you cant literally do 1vs5 on champs without lifesteal

Take a look at Kai'Sa then, even with the nerfs she's in a good spot and can carry really hard, you don't even have to play her botlane if you don't trust other players, since on bottom lane the fase lane is decided by the supps.
